subject: Marijuana
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Chris Simms, the Tennessee Titans’ backup quarterback, said that the police mistook a comment about smoking cigarettes as an admission that he had been smoking marijuana before he was stopped while driving in Manhattan.
snippet: Chris Simms, the Tennessee Titans’ backup quarterback, said that the police mistook a comment about smoking cigarettes as an admission that he had been smoking marijuana before he was stopped while driving in Manhattan.
